item.title: Anti-Anti Masker Mask [Hackathon: Winner]
item.author: simon@gorbet.com (Simon Gorbet)
item.description: A wearable system that detects nearby unmasked individuals and automatically launches soft darts to enforce social distancing. Built in 24 hours during covid.
